actions.name: Sky Drop
actions.description:
Effect: Set-Up: The user @Affliction[grapple]s the target and freely moves themself and the target up to the user's Overland or Flight Score into the air, and ends their Activation. While in this state, both have +4 EVA Stages.

Resolution: On the user's next Activation, the user freely Moves up to their Overland or Flying Score and slams the target to the ground, inflicting @Affliction[grounded] 5 and resolving this attack's damage. Creatures WC 12 or higher are unaffected by Sky Drop.
